## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G25570](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G25570)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SAMDC3</u>
- **Gene Name:** S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase 3
- **Description:**   Adenosylmethionine decarboxylase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **Description:**   Derives_from AT3G25570;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
